function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change leading to increased health burden","Impact":"Higher health care costs, lost work days, lower productivity, and well-being issues in urban areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of climate change mitigation strategies, focus on urban health initiatives","Technologies":"Climate modeling, urban planning tools, green infrastructure","People":"Urban populations, public health officials, regional planners, labor sector","Owner":"Public health organizations, urban planners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increased risk of urban mosquito-borne diseases","Impact":"Exacerbation of health issues due to climate change, high health care costs, well-being issues","Mitigation":"Implementation of urban mosquito control measures, climate-resilient urban design, public health education","Technologies":"Mosquito traps, insecticide spraying, climate-resilient urban infrastructure","People":"Urban populations, public health officials, regional planners","Owner":"Public health organizations, urban planners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Urbanization leading to higher environmental challenges for human health","Impact":"Increased greenhouse gas emissions, land use change, environmental health hazards, and energy consumption","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable urban development, green infrastructure, and urban planning","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, green building technologies, renewable energy solutions","People":"Urban populations, public health officials, urban planners, environmental organizations","Owner":"Urban planners, government agencies, environmental organizations"}]}
